adrs.title: ADR-0001: Automated NPM Releases with Semantic Release
adrs.summary: Implement Semantic Release for automated NPM publishing with version management and changelog generation.

adrs.title: ADR-0002: English as Primary Language for Documentation and Comments
adrs.summary: Establish English as the mandatory language for all project documentation, comments, and textual content.

adrs.title: ADR-0003: No CLI Parameter Overrides - Document-Centric Design
adrs.summary: Establish that XTOON documents are self-describing and portable. All processing parameters must be specified in XML attributes, not CLI flags.

adrs.title: ADR-0004: RFC 4180 CSV Quoting and Escaping
adrs.summary: Adopt RFC 4180 as the authoritative CSV quoting and escaping specification for XTOON row parsing, with clarifications for tail capture and error handling.
